verses.name: 1 Kings 15:30
verses.text: Because of the sins of Jeroboam which he sinned, and which he made Israel sin, by his provocation wherewith he provoked the Lord God of Israel to anger.

verses.name: 1 Kings 15:31
verses.text: Now the rest of the acts of Nadab, and all that he did, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Israel?

verses.name: 1 Kings 15:32
verses.text: And there was war between Asa and Baasha king of Israel all their days.

verses.name: 1 Kings 15:33
verses.text: In the third year of Asa king of Judah began Baasha the son of Ahijah to reign over all Israel in Tirzah, twenty and four years.
